config.comments: This job will count the number of lines and characters in the flowfile.

entry.value:
from org.apache.nifi.processor.io import StreamCallback from java.io import BufferedReader, InputStreamReader
class PyStreamCallback(StreamCallback): def process(self, inputStream, outputStream): reader = BufferedReader(InputStreamReader(inputStream, "UTF-8")) lines = [] line = reader.readLine() while line is not None: lines.append(line) line = reader.readLine() reader.close()
if not lines: return
# Build new content with Region column new_content = "" for i, l in enumerate(lines): if i == 0: new_content += l + ",Region\n" else: new_content += l + ",APAC\n"
# Write back as bytes outputStream.write(bytearray(new_content.encode("UTF-8"))) outputStream.flush()
flowFile = session.get() if flowFile is not None: flowFile = session.write(flowFile, PyStreamCallback()) session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS)

entry.key: Log level when file not found
